title: 29: OBITCH what're you ghana do about it...
description:
Obitch! It’s our last episode of the year! This week Spencer talks about prohibition of death, Madison comes at us with Ghana fantasy coffins, we’ve got an obituary for a wild redhead, as well as a titanic survivor, and of course, we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminallllllls! Happy New Year Geoff’s we love ya! 
Follow us: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sponsors: 
Daily Harvest: Visit dailyharvest.com/obit for up to $40 off your first box! 
Sources: 
https://nypost.com/2019/10/23/florida-man-arrested-for-sexually-assaulting-stuffed-olaf-at-target/ https://norwaytoday.info/everyday/is-it-really-illegal-to-die-in-longyearbyen-norway/ https://www.theguardian.com/cities/2015/sep/30/where-in-the-world-is-it-illegal-to-die https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/declared-deaths/ http://www.kanekwei.com/about https://www.bbc.com/news/world-africa-44303067#:~:text=Dance%20and%20song%20are%20part%20of%20funerals%20in,the%20other%20titles%20that%20come%20with%20a%20death https://people.howstuffworks.com/culture-traditions/funerals/ghana-fantasy-coffins.htm https://www.joincake.com/blog/fantasy-coffins/ https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/6826130/violet-constance-jessop https://www.newsweek.com/scooter-low-speed-chase-1455904 https://www.thelineofbestfit.com/news/latest-news/read-lou-reeds-obituary-written-by-wife-laurie-anderson-140555 See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
